message: Let's start simple. Take $1000, and we can both be done with this quickly.
You're not getting off that easy. I'll give you a decent chunk, but you'll have to negotiate harder to get more.
I'm willing to split the difference from your last offer. This seems like a fair compromise.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Meet me in the middle and we can wrap this up.
